questions.question: Which of the following aspects of life in the US have benefitted from the contributions of immigrants?

choices.answer: politics, the arts, language, and the economy
The stock market
Health care
technology

questions.question: Which of the following statements BEST expresses the central idea of "The Immigration Contribution"?

choices.answer: Immigration is a core part of American society  and the nation's values
Immigrants have made contributions to American history, culture and politic
Immigrants have had difficulty assimilating to American society, but adapt
Immigration reflects the plentiful opportunities the nation offers

questions.question: What two main hopes did nearly all immigrants to the US share?

choices.answer: Security and adventure
Personal freedom and economic opportunities
Happiness and joy
Cultural stability and courage

imageMetadata.altText: FILE PHOTO  40th Anniversary Of Cuban Missile Crisis

questions.question: What is the concept of the melting pot?

choices.answer: People newly arrived or long established in the US are equal
Desire for new immigrants to fit in with the dominant culture
The belief that a shared background as a nation of immigrants unifies us.
Process of blending many ethnicities in the US into a single nationalities

questions.question: Which statement most accurately describes the relationship between a woman and her descendants?

choices.answer: They are relatives who lived before she was born.
They are her children or children of her children
They are part of a group of families who live together
They are her family members who immigrated to the U.S. together

questions.question: When does a person go through the naturalization process?

choices.answer: When he/she becomes an immigrant
When he/she gets a legal job in the U.S.
When he/she becomes a citizen
When he/she travels to the U.S. for a visit

imageMetadata.altText: American Flag in front of The White House

questions.question: How is immigration to the U.S. a gesture of social mobility?

choices.answer: The pioneering spirit is kept alive by immigrants
Immigrants are a central part of the social process
Immigrants contribute to industrial, agricultural and business growth
Belief that it can improve your social and economic status

questions.question: What does the idea of equality mean in the U.S.?

choices.answer: Granting citizens equality is the best way to create a powerful nation
All U.S. citizens should have equal opportunities and freedoms
People of different talents/abilities are still equal in character
U.S. citizens view one another as equals instead of looking down on anyone

imageMetadata.altText: Math Lesson - Nerd  Chick Chicken Humor Fun Mathematics Easter

questions.question: Which of the following statements is the main opinion of immigrants in this essay?

choices.answer: Immigrants have overcome hard times to live successfully in U.S.
Immigrants embody the spirit of the U.S. and have defined its history
Immigrants have significantly contributed to U.S. economy/politics /art
Immigrants have contributed to the nation's development since its founding

questions.question: Which three words are clear examples of charged language used to persuade or convey a message?

choices.answer: anonymous, immigrant, senator
role, agricultural, economy
indispensable, giant, leading
noteworthy, calm, dispensable

imageMetadata.altText: Business people on a meeting at the office

questions.question: Which of the following is one meaning of the Latin root   -nat ?

choices.answer: to be born
to be bad
to be found
to be strong
a procedure before the main procedure
preventative tools to keep an illness from striking a patient
medical care to a mother and child before the child is born
strong medication prior to an operation or another procedure

imageMetadata.altText: Animal Rescue Centres Feel The Strain After Christmas Pets Are Abandoned

questions.question: What type of sentence is this? Nearly all immigrants, transport their customs as well as their traditions.

choices.answer: simple
compound
complex
compound-complex

questions.question: Which sentence is a compound sentence or has two independent clauses?

choices.answer: You are a nice person, and you are my friend.
When you go to the store, bring me a snack.
I am happy you are here.
Stay near the house.

imageMetadata.altText: Great Barrier Reef aerial Knuckle Reef

questions.question: Which of these sentences is a complex sentence or has 1 independent clause and one dependent clause?

choices.answer: Sauerkraut and angst are two German words that are now part of English.
You are a nice person, and you help others all the time.
She went for groceries, and she came home with a new phone.
This is an old house, and the roof is in disrepair.

questions.question: What makes up a compound-complex sentence?

choices.answer: One independent clause and one dependent clause
Two independent clause plus one dependent clause
One dependent clause
Two independent clauses
